home.subtitle: The best way to find your next tennis or pickleball partner

hero.headline: Your next match is waiting.
hero.subheadline: Connect with compatible players, schedule games effortlessly, and never play alone again.
hero.ctaSubtext: No credit card required • Exclusive early access

scheduling.title: The Scheduling Nightmare
scheduling.description: Hours spent coordinating through WhatsApp groups and Facebook. Last-minute cancellations. Games that never happen.

compatibility.title: The Compatibility Crisis
compatibility.description: Skill mismatches ruin the experience. Location conflicts. Surface preferences don't align. Finding the right match feels impossible.

reliability.title: The Reliability Problem
reliability.description: No-shows without warning. Serial flakeys with no accountability. No way to know who's trustworthy.

growth.title: The Growth Barrier
growth.description: Can't find enough games to improve. Limited partner pool. Skill progression stalls without consistent play.

step1.title: Join the Waitlist
step1.description: Sign up with your email to secure your spot and get notified when we launch.

step2.title: Create Your Profile
step2.description: Tell us about your skill level, location, and playing preferences.

step3.title: Get Matched
step3.description: We find perfect playing partners based on your profile and availability.

step4.title: Play & Review
step4.description: Schedule matches instantly and build your reliable player network.

matchmaking.title: Smart Matchmaking
matchmaking.description: Smart skill assessment and reliability tracking. Get paired with players who match your level and commitment.

scheduling.title: Instant Scheduling
scheduling.description: One-click match proposals with smart calendar sync. Auto-confirmations and live availability. No more endless back-and-forth.

marketplace.title: Game Marketplace
marketplace.description: Post or browse matches by time, location, and skill level. Instant booking with built-in ratings and reviews.

portfolio.title: Player Network
portfolio.description: Build your roster of favorite players. Get smart suggestions based on your preferences and play history.

whyJoinEarly.description: Be part of the founding community and enjoy exclusive perks that won't be available after launch.

priority.title: Priority Access
priority.description: Skip the line and get immediate access when we launch. No waiting period.

pricing.title: Special Early Benefits
pricing.description: Enjoy special perks and benefits as an early supporter. Founding members get exclusive advantages.

influence.title: Shape the Product
influence.description: Your feedback directly influences features. Help us build exactly what you need.

exclusive.title: Exclusive Features
exclusive.description: Get early access to beta features and new releases before anyone else.

community.title: Founding Community
community.description: Connect with other early adopters and build your network before the crowd arrives.

support.title: VIP Support
support.description: Direct line to our team. Get priority support and help shape our service standards.

cta.headline: Ready to Transform Your Tennis Experience?
cta.description: Be among the first to experience the future of tennis matchmaking. Join our waitlist and get exclusive early access when we launch.

first.name: Sarah M.
first.text: I tested the beta and the skill matching is incredible. Can't wait for the full launch - this will completely change how I find tennis partners!

second.name: Michael R.
second.text: Finally, someone is solving the real problem! The interface is clean and the matching algorithm actually understands what players need.

third.name: Jennifer L.
third.text: The scheduling feature alone is worth it. As a beta tester, I'm excited to see where this goes. Sign up for the waitlist!

waitlist.description: Be among the first to experience the future of tennis matchmaking. Get exclusive early access and special perks.

form.successMessage: Thanks! We'll be in touch soon.
form.noCard: No credit card required • Get exclusive perks as an early supporter

cost.question: Is Rallia free to use?
cost.answer: We're currently finalizing our pricing model. Early supporters will receive special benefits. Join the waitlist to stay updated on our plans.

sports.question: What sports are supported?
sports.answer: Currently, we support tennis and pickleball. We're planning to expand to other racquet sports like squash and badminton based on user demand.

matching.question: How does the skill matching work?
matching.answer: Our system analyzes your self-reported skill level, match history, and player feedback to accurately assess your ability. You'll be matched with players within your skill range for competitive and enjoyable games.

privacy.question: Is my data private and secure?
privacy.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and never share your personal information with third parties. You control what information is visible to other players.

availability.question: When will Rallia be available?
availability.answer: We're currently in beta testing and plan to launch publicly in early 2026. Join our waitlist to get early access and be notified when we launch in your area.

platforms.question: What platforms is Rallia available on?
platforms.answer: Rallia will be available as a web app, iOS app, and Android app. You'll be able to access your account and schedule matches from any device.

winter.title: Winter Indoor Court Crisis - Rallia
winter.subtitle: Solving the indoor court shortage for Canadian tennis and pickleball players

hero.headline: The outdoor season is over. Now what?
hero.subheadline: Over 5 million Canadian tennis players and 1.5 million pickleballers are about to be benched for weeks, sidelined by a severe lack of indoor courts.
hero.ctaSubtext: Premium features FREE at launch • Help shape the app

problem.coreMessage: There simply aren't enough indoor courts for everyone who wants to play.

noCourtNoGame.title: No Court, No Game
noCourtNoGame.description: A shortage of indoor facilities is about to sideline 6 million Canadian tennis and pickleball players. While the demand for these sports is exploding, the number of indoor courts has stayed the same.

bookingCompetition.title: Booking is a Competition
bookingCompetition.description: It shouldn't be a competitive sport just to book a court. Prime time slots are gone in minutes. You're left refreshing pages at midnight, hoping for a cancellation.

temperatureDrop.title: Benched by the Cold
temperatureDrop.description: Your playing time shouldn't end just because the temperature drops. But without access to indoor facilities, thousands of players will go weeks—or months—without stepping on a court.

stats.courtDensityLabel: Indoor Court to Player Ratio in Canada
stats.demandGrowthLabel: Growth in Tennis & Pickleball Demand Since 2020

solution.sectionTitle: A Better Way to Share Court Time
solution.pitch: We're building a better way to connect and share court time.
solution.vision: We're building a community where players help each other get on the court, no matter the season.

findPartners.title: Find Booked Court Partners
findPartners.description: Connect with players who have already booked a court and need a partner. No court? No problem. They've done the hard part—now you just need to show up and play.

shareCosts.title: Share the Cost
shareCosts.description: Indoor court time is expensive. Share the cost of that premium court with a great match, making winter play affordable for everyone.

fillCancellations.title: Fill Last-Minute Cancellations
fillCancellations.description: Get notified when court time opens up. Fill last-minute cancellations so no court time goes to waste. Turn someone's cancellation into your opportunity.

unlockPotential.title: Maximize Existing Facilities
unlockPotential.description: Unlock the full potential of existing facilities while championing future construction. Every court should be used to its maximum capacity.

foundingMember.offer: Sign up for the waitlist and get premium features FREE at launch.
foundingMember.survey: Help us build the perfect app for Canadian players. Join the waitlist and we'll send you a 3-question survey to tell us what you need most.
foundingMember.benefits: Premium features FREE • Shape the product • Priority access

waitlist.description: Be part of the solution. Join our waitlist and help us build a community where every player gets on the court, no matter the season.

form.successMessage: Welcome to the founding community! Stay posted for future updates.
form.noCard: No credit card required • Premium features FREE at launch

whatIsThis.question: How does this solve the indoor court problem?
whatIsThis.answer: We're helping Canadian tennis and pickleball players deal with the indoor court shortage during winter months. We're building tools to help players find partners who have already booked courts, share costs, and fill last-minute cancellations—maximizing the use of existing facilities.

foundingMember.question: What do Founding Members get?
foundingMember.answer: Founding Members get premium features completely free when we launch. You'll also help shape the product through our survey, get priority access to the app, and be part of the community from day one.

whenLaunch.question: When will this be available?
whenLaunch.answer: We're launching in early 2026, just in time for the outdoor season. You'll have the full summer to build your network and master the app, so when winter 2026-2027 arrives, you'll be ready to dominate indoor court bookings. Join the waitlist to be notified when we launch.

bothSports.question: Does this work for both tennis and pickleball?
bothSports.answer: Yes! The indoor court shortage affects both tennis and pickleball players. Our platform is designed to help players of both sports find partners, share costs, and maximize court time.

howHelp.question: How will this help with the court shortage?
howHelp.answer: While we can't build new courts overnight, we can help maximize the use of existing facilities. By connecting players who need courts with those who have them booked, sharing costs, and filling cancellations, we ensure every minute of court time is used.

footer.title: Rallia
footer.description: The platform that will connect tennis and pickleball players for better matches, every time.
